name: Fresh Apple Cake
author: Donna Menz
instructions: Preheat oven to 350Â°. In large bowl, stir together apples and sug- ar. Add dry ingredients, stir well. In separate bowl beat eggs, oil and vanilla. Stir egg mixture into apple mixture, blending until thoroughly moistened. Stir in pecans. Pour into greased 9 x 13 inch pan. Bake 50 minutes or until cake springs back. Serve with apple dessert sauce or Cool Whip.
